text:
I tried to run ant in Apple's Project Builder. Unfortunately, the JAVA_HOME variable is 
not defined per se on OS X. Now, I could set this in a build setting, but as there is only one 
JDK fo OS X, the most reasonable thing would be to add this early in the "$ANT_HOME/bin/
ant" script.
--
if $darwin ; then
  if [ -z "$JAVA_HOME" ] ; then
    JAVA_HOME=/System/Library/Frameworks/JavaVM.framework/Home   
  fi
fi
--
